name: Mr. Ahmed Khan
subject: Principal
bio: A visionary leader dedicated to fostering an environment of academic excellence and holistic development. Believes in nurturing every student's potential.

name: Mrs. Fatima Ali
subject: Mathematics
bio: Passionate about making mathematics accessible and enjoyable for all students. Specializes in advanced calculus and problem-solving strategies.

name: Mr. Samuel Chen
subject: Physics
bio: An expert in theoretical and applied physics, Mr. Chen inspires students to explore the wonders of the universe through hands-on experiments and engaging lectures.

name: Ms. Aisha Baig
subject: English Literature
bio: Ms. Baig encourages a love for literature and critical thinking. Her classes are known for lively discussions on classic and contemporary works.

name: Mr. David Rodriguez
subject: History
bio: Brings history to life by connecting past events to present-day issues. His storytelling approach makes learning history an unforgettable experience.

name: Dr. Emily Carter
subject: Chemistry
bio: With a Ph.D. in Organic Chemistry, Dr. Carter is committed to safety and discovery in the lab, preparing students for careers in science and medicine.

name: Ms. Nida Hussain
subject: Biology
bio: A biologist with a passion for ecology and genetics. Ms. Hussain's classes often include field trips and hands-on lab work to study the natural world.

name: Mr. Omar Sharif
subject: Computer Science
bio: Specializing in software development and AI, Mr. Sharif equips students with the essential coding skills for the future of technology.

name: Mrs. Sofia Khan
subject: Art & Design
bio: An accomplished artist herself, Mrs. Khan nurtures creativity and self-expression, helping students build strong portfolios in various media.
